topics.title: Getting started
topics.desc: Create an account and set up your profile.

articles.title: Create your Rep-Link account
articles.excerpt: How to sign up as a Rep or Business and complete your profile.
articles.body:
Sign up

Go to Sign up, choose Rep or Business, and enter your details.

Verify

After creating your account, link Singpass (mock in prototype) to prefill identity details.

articles.title: Milestone payments & commissions
articles.excerpt: Understand milestone creation, approvals, and payout timing.
articles.body: Rep-Link supports Fixed and Milestone commissions (no hourly). Each milestone needs a title, amount, and due date. Payout releases shortly after acceptance or per contract terms.

articles.title: Privacy Policy summary
articles.excerpt: A human-readable summary of our PDPA-aligned privacy practices.
articles.body: This is a summary. For the full policy, read the dedicated page.

articles.title: Complete your profile
articles.excerpt: Add your skills, experience, and portfolio to attract opportunities.
articles.body:
Profile Information

Fill out your profile with relevant experience and skills.

Portfolio

Upload samples of your work to showcase your capabilities.

articles.title: How to apply for opportunities
articles.excerpt: Learn how to find and apply for sales opportunities on Rep-Link.
articles.body:
Browse Opportunities

Use the search filters to find opportunities that match your skills.

Submit Proposal

Write a compelling proposal explaining why you're the right fit.

articles.title: Post a sales opportunity
articles.excerpt: Create and manage sales opportunities for your business.
articles.body:
Create Opportunity

Define your sales goals, commission structure, and requirements.

Review Applications

Review and select the best proposals from sales reps.

articles.title: Account verification process

articles.body:
Identity Verification

Complete identity verification using Singpass integration.

Security Settings

Enable two-factor authentication and review security settings.

articles.title: Understanding commission structures
articles.excerpt: Learn about different commission types and payment schedules.
articles.body:
Fixed Commissions

One-time payments for completed sales or milestones.

Milestone Commissions

Payments tied to specific project milestones or deliverables.
